main event: An ex-USAF pilot reported observing a bright fireball in the sky over Newport & Richland, Georgia on August 5, 1948.
interesting points: The fireball was described as having blue-white streaks of light., The length of the object was approximately 2600 feet., The elevation of the object ranged between 20,000-35,000 feet., The sighting lasted for 5-10 seconds., The observer stressed that it was not a shooting or falling star.
